life.dashyeah.LibMgr

类 BookMgr

  • java.lang.Object
    • life.dashyeah.LibMgr.BookMgr

  • public abstract class BookMgr
extends java.lang.Object
    Library management system helper util: book related.
    作者:
    Dash Wong dashengyeah@github

    • 方法详细资料

      • existBook

        public static boolean existBook(java.lang.String bookid)
        To find out if a book exists.
        参数:
        bookid - specified book's id
        返回:
        true yes
        false no

      • hasCopy

        public static boolean hasCopy(java.lang.String bookid)
        To find out if there is any copy of a book.
        参数:
        bookid - specified book's id
        返回:
        true yes
        false no

      • existCopy

        public static boolean existCopy(java.lang.String copyid)
        To find out if a copy exists.
        参数:
        copyid - specified copy's id
        返回:
        true yes
        false no

      • addBook

        public static boolean addBook(Book book)
        Add a book to database.
        参数:
        book - information of the book.
        返回:
        true successful
        false failed

      • deleteBook

        public static boolean deleteBook(java.lang.String bookid)
        delete a book and all its copies from database.
        参数:
        bookid - specified book's id
        返回:
        true successful
        false failed

      • addCopy

        public static boolean addCopy(java.lang.String bookid,
                              int count)
        Add copy of a book.
        参数:
        bookid - specified book's id
        count - amount of copies.
        返回:
        true successful
        false failed

      • deleteCopy

        public static boolean deleteCopy(java.lang.String copyid)
        delete a copy from database.
        参数:
        copyid - specified copy's id.
        返回:
        true successful
        false failed

      • isRent

        public static boolean isRent(java.lang.String copyid)
        To find out if a copy is borrowed by someone.
        参数:
        copyid - specified copy's id
        返回:
        true yes
        false no

      • getConfig

        public static java.lang.String getConfig(java.lang.String key)
        To get a configuration's value of the system.
        参数:
        key - configuration name
        返回:
        configuration value

      • searchBook

        public static org.json.simple.JSONArray searchBook(java.lang.String key)
        search books in database which name contains any of the keywords.
        参数:
        key - keywords, using ' ' to separate more one keyword.
        返回:
        a JSONArray contains all results.
